titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z107b: Ketubah, 1928.

notesStmt.note: There was no Adar II in 1928. The date March 2, 1928 is based on the possibility that a scribal error occured, and that the month Adar I was intended. It is also possible that an error was made in recording the year.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
